attributes.action: Place an immediate stop on strip searches of children by police
attributes.additional_details:
We were shocked, angered and dismayed by the Children's Commissioners recent report into the strip searching of children which found:-
- thousands of children - some as young as 8 - have been stripped searched by police across the country;
- Black children are 6 times as likely to be victims and therefore disproportionately targeted by police

We are inviting people from across communities to join us in demanding that the Home Secretary immediately place a stop on strip searches of children by police

Please support this petition by adding your signature, and forwarding to your contacts.
attributes.background: We are petitioning the Home Secretary to immediately stop the strip searching of children by police

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/635521
